metadata.synopsis: The Dark Urge missed Orin's defeat or lost the duel.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Play with Dark Urge in the party.Queue SkippedTempleFinale night.

61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
61.text: Get up! Get up! Quit malingering in your red dreams.
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tav is tossing in their sleep, and the sound of many screams in unison fills their head. Butler appears and yells at them

47.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
47.text: You have squandered your inheritance. Oaf, Bhaalslug!

48.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
48.text: The Slayer is an ill-fitting suit, not tailored to that lazed body you have left to waste away.

16.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
16.text: I will lock it away, perhaps never to be worn again.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: VFX - something bad happening to the player - they are no longer in possession of the slayer

49.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
49.text: You should have stayed dead in the Temple as Bhaal's ritual lamb, rather than bear the shame of crawling back to life after your defeat.

64.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
64.text: I really thought I could win the fight.

11.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
11.text: My simpering lordling, you failed the entrance exam your august Father shed his very seed to prepare you for.

37.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
37.text: And I, your only tutor, feel naught but humiliation for letting your education fall so short.

32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
32.text: Never before has a Bhaalspawn left a Blood Wedding at the altar. What were you doing, coward, not facing your sister?

36.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
36.text: To tell the truth: I was afraid.

30.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
30.text: I will not fault you for fear. You think I don't fear Bhaal?

24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
24.text: Fear of Bhaal ruins me. No matter how many times I am reborn - the rotted phoenix rising from sheer agony - I can never get my heart to slow its tormenting lurches.

9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
9.text: The only moments of hope amidst the terror are snatched from the dark when I am around you, Master.

53.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
53.text: But you didn't fear only Bhaal. You feared yourself. That I shall never forgive.

20.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
20.text: Begone. Leave me in peace at last.

63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
63.text: Hee hee! You speak of the Urge as if it were some enchantment or curse. My dear, disgraced Master: the Urge is you.

7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
7.text: Now that you have failed Bhaal, the Urge shall come calling to claim you, the moment that tadpole is not in your head.

12.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
12.text: You will not be your clever self, murderous erudite. Stupid, stupid bastard orphan baby.

28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
28.text: When you have reached the depths of your lunacy, you shall reflect the time we spent together as your flower-days.

2.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
2.text: Ruined mind waxing ever-red, with less reason than a feral ratling, crawling from ditch to sewer, suckling on your dagger's rust.

1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
1.text: It seems your cruelty was uninspired in the end.

57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
57.text: To call you 'Master' brings me shame.

60.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
60.text: Won't you stay with me? Until the end...

17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
17.text: There was a day where I longed for your caress. I dreamed of sitting like a pup in the lap of the Slayer.

27.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
27.text: But it is not to be.

14.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
14.text: The world will still be subdued by my hand. Alone, without Bhaal's meddling.

8.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
8.text: What's the point in all that brutalising domination if you don't have a family to go back to at the end of the day?

39.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
39.text: I am not needed. As you are disinherited, I have no Liege to serve.

52.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
52.text: A Butler lives to serve. And as I can no longer serve, I will surely die. Once and for all.

62.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
62.text: I hate you, Master. I hate you, I hate you, I hate you.
62.context: NodeContext: Sniffling bawling his eyes out, very childish.

6.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
6.text: For what it's worth: I'm sorry.

29.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
29.text: Not half as sorry as I, who lived for you alone. Goodbye, Master.

3.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
3.text: Not now. You have killed me by robbing me of all purpose.

65.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
65.text: They won't write books of you, but if they do, let history tell: Sceleritas Fel died of a broken heart.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Butler has death animation used in GLO_DarkUrge_Butler default dialogue

19.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
19.text: Save me, then. I'll do whatever you want.

68.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
68.text: I don't want anything. Every moment we were together, I was perfectly content. But now...

38.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
38.text: Not if I become an illithid first.

26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
26.text: Perhaps it would be for the best, at least they bear some dignity.

13.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
13.text: Lies, this city will be mine yet. You will see.

69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
69.text: You shall be a naked filthy piglet soon, supping on bones. You shall hardly be able to defecate in the corner, yet alone rule the world.

66.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
66.text: Oh... It still pains me to see my little liege in distress. Oh, please, don't cry. I... will always love you. But I must go.

35.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
35.text: Is this the end of my Urges?

46.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
46.text: I can still subdue the Coast. I will prove myself worthy again.

15.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
15.text: Is there any way I can make it up to Bhaal?

31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
31.text: Bhaal will never restore you, abortive spawn.

4.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
4.text: But the Lord's line cannot end. If you ever heed a single word from me, heed this: Go forth and breed widely. Sire a new legion, and set them upon self-slaughter.

51.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
51.text: Your fertile organ is now your sole weapon. Combined, potent worm and gravid womb may honour Bhaal's name.

0.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
0.text: I needed to guarantee that Bhaal would not claim me as his Chosen.

40.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
40.text: Why... why...? I adored you. I never expected you to demonstrate such resplendent mediocrity, such impotence!

44.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
44.text: I don't remember... it's all a blur.
